TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Kaviyangan, title = Kaviyangan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaviyangan} }

S.FORM: Kaviyangan i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kaviyangan. u kasalumaluma' nu Kaviyangan sa, 185 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 761 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 721 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 40 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 92%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 2%.

Kaviyangan i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kaviyangan. o kasalomaloma' no Kaviyangan sa, 185 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 761 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 721 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 40 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 92%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 2%.
